mapper.insert: insert into tb_sys_menu (pid, icon, index, title, flag, create_time, remark) values (#{pid}, #{icon}, #{index}, #{title}, #{flag}, now(), '')
mapper.update: update tb_sys_menu set pid = #{pid}, icon = #{icon}, index = #{index}, title = #{title}, flag = #{flag}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.id, t.pid, t.icon, t.index, t.title, t.flag, t.create_time, t.remark, tm.title ptitle from tb_sys_menu t left join tb_sys_menu tm on t.pid = tm.id order by id desc
select id, pid, icon, index, title, flag, create_time, remark from tb_sys_menu t where t.flag = '0' order by id desc
